entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Lincoln
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:54 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Flurries beginning before morning. Wind west 30 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h. Temperature steady near plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023
